Title: Wisdom of Lord Glorfindel II
Text:
The Ford of Bruinen is to the west of Imladris, at the bottom of the steeply-climbing slopes.
Lord Glorfindel has given you an Elf-stone and has asked you to test its powers by holding it aloft on the banks of the Bruinen.
CompleteText:
Lord Glorfindel is in Imladris, high above the Bruinen and to the east, by the waterfall outside the Last Homely House.
Glorfindel is waiting to speak with you upon your return from the Ford of Bruinen.
